ARABIC: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When they were told, There is no god but Allah,' they were arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They were those who, when it was said to them, "There is no god but God," behaved with insolence,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Whenever it was said to them: “There is no true deity apart from Allah,” they waxed proud
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They were the ones, who on being told, "God is only One," become puffed-up with pride
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed, when it was said to them, “There is no God except Allah”, they were haughty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Truly, when it was said to them: "La ilaha illallah," they puffed themselves up with pride.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely they used to behave proudly when it was said to them: There is no god but Allah;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: for when it was said to them, 'There is no god but God,' they were ever waxing proud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: For when it was said unto them, There is no Allah save Allah, they were scornful
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When they were told, "There is no deity but God," they turned away with disdain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily when it was said Unto them: there is no god but Allah, they ever grew stiff-necked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, it was they who, when they were told, ‘There is no god except Allah,’ used to be disdainful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For they, when they were told that there is no god except Allah, would puff themselves up with Pride,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Truly, when it was said to them: La ilaha ill-Allah "(none has the right to be worshipped but Allah)," they puffed themselves up with pride (i.e. denied it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: For when it was said to them: 'There is no god except Allah' they were always proud
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When it was said to them, “There is no god except God,” they grew arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:35] For truly it was they who, in other words, [it was] these [sinners] who — given the context that follows — when it was said to them, ‘There is no god except God’, used to be scornful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (For when it was said unto them) in the life of the world, say: (There is no god save Allah, they were scornful) they were too proud to say it
